LibrarySearch
Class FileIO

java.lang.Object
  LibrarySearch.FileIO

public class FileIO
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for the reading in of information from files, and creating references from the data. Also, it is responsible for taking a list of references and writing each reference to a file. November 11 2013

Constructor Summary
FileIO()
          Default constructor: sets the default input and output stream buffers to the keyboard and the screen, respectively.

public java.util.ArrayList<Reference> readDataFromFile(java.lang.String inFile)

writeDataToFile

public boolean writeDataToFile(java.util.ArrayList<Reference> referenceList,
                               java.lang.String outFile)
Open the output file for writing and write to it a list of references.

Parameters:
referenceList - List of references in system
outFile - File where the list of references will be written
